about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about AI and Machine Learning
description: Experienced Machine Learning Engineer and Data Scientist with 5+ years of delivering production-ready AI solutions across Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Computer Vision. Specialized in scalable MLOps, cloud deployment, and model optimization.

I have deep expertise in fine-tuning large-scale transformer and deep learning models using advanced methods like QLoRA, LoRA, and RLHF. Successfully integrated AI solutions into real-world products, driving measurable gains in accuracy, efficiency, and business outcomes.
